rules_text:
Reach, trample, vigilance
Decompose into X/X green Ooze creature {X}{G}{G} [i]({X}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s an X/X green Ooze creature with no mana cost and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Nourishing Hydra

These two were doing very similar things, and since Jelly shows off a novel usage of Decompose, and there’s another nourish rare in green, this seemed like a good swap.
